name: SPF - Sun Protection Force
description:
As the sun, you must protect the people of the earth from getting horrible sunburns! 

Use your mouse to expertly position the sun, keeping your friends safely in the shade. If a certain number of lemmings are reduced to piles of ash, it's game over!

Use the mouse for this game

A game by Kyle Neubarth and Madeline Lamee for game studio "Light" Jam
